data.text: airBaltic announces that it has made a decision to leave the Russian market until further notice and cancel all of the planned flights to and from Russian destinations. This decision follows the previous announcement of the temporary flight suspension. https://t.co/4sLAD0hx5g

airBaltic paziņo, ka pieņēmusi lēmumu līdz turpmākam paziņojumam atstāt Krievijas tirgu un atcelt visus plānotos reisus uz un no galamērķiem Krievijā. Šis lēmums seko pēc iepriekš izziņotā lidojumu apturēšanas paziņojuma. https://t.co/ykqycioCaO

We #StandWithUkraine 🇺🇦 Our hearts and thoughts are with the brave Ukrainian nation. We have made several efforts to support the Ukrainian people affected by the current situation: https://t.co/ziKcIMZFOW https://t.co/gr0F9AAiAL
airBaltic extends suspension of flights to Russia until the end of May: https://t.co/gyTud7oKcP
airBaltic aptur lidojumus uz Krieviju līdz maija beigām: https://t.co/KZvLiH5qdI
airBaltic suspends flights to Russia: https://t.co/5WEakOJGOH
airBaltic aptur lidojumus uz Krieviju: https://t.co/LX79y9t6UW

Welcome to the family YL-ABG! This delivery is quite special, it's the first aircraft that has been certified to operate up to 148 seats instead of the 145. Happy to welcome it to our big Airbus family! https://t.co/kCv6qs01ZP
airBaltic aptur visus lidojumus uz Ukrainu: https://t.co/WVZA4tvuvO
airBaltic suspends all flights to Ukraine: https://t.co/FQniRa52Qe

Due to airspace closure for civil aviation all our flights to/from Kyiv on February 24th are cancelled.

Sakarā ar gaisa telpas slēgšanu airBaltic informē, ka tiek atcelti reisi uz Kijevu un atpakaļ 24. februārī. https://t.co/GSWGRZn5p0

data.text:
Our GREEN SALE is on, with cheap flights to all airBaltic destinations all through 2022 💚 Travelling in Europe is already blooming, so book flights starting from 19€ and plan your dream trip now: https://t.co/xegovcWsfy
Book 🎫 22.02 - 08.03.2022
Travel ✈️ 14.03 - 15.12.2022 https://t.co/8q2Z39WHZw

airBaltic paziņo, ka pašreizējās situācijas dēļ tā pieņēmusi lēmumu līdz 2022. gada februāra beigām apturēt nakts lidojumus uz un no Ukrainas. Lidsabiedrība turpinās nodrošināt reisus no Kijevas gan uz Rīgu, gan Viļņu: https://t.co/0Ltz9VJSTV https://t.co/0fV6DqnrtG

airBaltic announces that due to the current situation it has made a decision to temporarily suspend overnight flights to and from Ukraine until the end of February 2022. The airline will continue to provide flights from Kyiv to both Riga and Vilnius: https://t.co/4iaGsI1d1Q https://t.co/J5NdfV7glA

data.text: Do not miss out on the last bits of winter fun! ❄️ Just until February 18, book flights and bring your own skis or snowboard with a 30% discount – only for 24.49 EUR one way! 🏂⛷ Be sure to check out our skiing destinations and book now: https://t.co/pT9B7zAtyX https://t.co/uBuMmRgCSr

data.text: NEW route — Batumi! 🇬🇪 Located on the coast of the Black Sea, Batumi has it all — old town and skyscrapers, seaside, botanical gardens, and amusement parks! ✈️ Visit the second-largest city of Georgia starting from May 2nd with flights twice a week: https://t.co/85InDNLaOZ https://t.co/eaLlJCDoUD
Happy Birthday, Lithuania! May the years to come inspire new dreams, hopes, and achievements in which not even the sky is the limit! 🇱🇹 https://t.co/XealFhrvNl

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection | OpenSea
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text: airBaltic’s ninth #NFT collection is live! 🔔 The new edition of the City Collection features Valmiera #cryptoart and can now be purchased by #NFTCommmunity on @opensea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether: https://t.co/HjjoswvYpP https://t.co/cXuv6U4juk

To address the significant passenger demand for flights from Kyiv, Ukraine to Riga, Latvia, airBaltic has scheduled two additional flights on February 15 and February 16, 2022. Tickets for the flights can already be purchased on our webpage: https://t.co/caft3TcU8r https://t.co/11hJCK9qZz

Lai reaģētu uz ievērojamo pasažieru pieprasījumu, airBaltic ieplānojis divus papildu lidojumus no Kijevas, Ukrainā uz Rīgu, Latvijā šī gada 15. un 16. februārī. Biļetes šiem lidojumiem iespējams iegādāties mūsu mājaslapā: https://t.co/h0BjH7uUag https://t.co/Vqw0o1dsKC

data.text: Love comes in many different shapes and forms. But how do people at @airBaltic feel about #love? 👀 We asked them and got personal about it - watch the video to feel love in the air! Happy #ValentinesDay2022, travellers! 💖 https://t.co/Qgiu2Jebk0

We’re happy to be on the right path to recovery and see an increase in keen travelers! 🧳 During January 2022, airBaltic has carried 232% more passengers than during the same period last year. Totaling in over 147 000 passengers and 2480 performed flights: https://t.co/MUKP7gI8vQ https://t.co/lccbbGAOCg

What would life be without phones? 📱 During last year, a total of 320 000 flights have been booked via mobile devices, increasing mobile bookings to 28%! More information here: https://t.co/LGTYpFwgLM https://t.co/LhjL6od82T

February issue of Baltic Outlook is out! 🗺️ Surrounded by the magnetic waters of the Mediterranean, medieval castles, and lush marvels of nature, #Cyprus is in the spotlight this month.
Read this and other stories on board & online 👉 https://t.co/l1lRhvVc8x https://t.co/GW84x2yl8Z
Have you checked the calendar? 👀 Love is in the air (again), good thing our #A220 can take you there! 💚✈️ https://t.co/VDnsgtCC1W

Cherry Sale and lovely flight deals starting from 19€ are here! 💘 Enjoy the sweetest deals on flights to many destinations! Look for 🍒 prices now: https://t.co/pHbCxDFxlC
Book 🎫 01.02 - 15.02.2022
Travel ✈️ 21.02 - 29.10.2022 https://t.co/lDnzdEK33G

data.text: Stress-free travel and protection for your trip does sound nice! That’s why we have partnered up with XCover to offer you travel insurance - simply add it while purchasing your ticket online via https://t.co/YZH2a4156m ✈️☂️ More information available here: https://t.co/ZNb5Ux47K4 https://t.co/71TBENxfm2

Pamosties ar tasi siltas kafijas. Tik pazīstamajām ērtībām, kur vienmēr ir blakus kāds, kurš runā tavā valodā. Tu zini, ka jutīsies brīvi ceļā uz visiem 70 galamērķiem lidmašīnā, kur par tevi parūpēsies. Lido ar savējiem. Jūties kā mājās! https://t.co/1UB2lT4Cy9

We are proud to share that during the year 2021, airBaltic has maintained its status as the largest air mail carrier in the region! ✉️ ✈️ We have carried over 640 000 bags of airmail, totaling almost 9 000 tonnes of cargo and mail: https://t.co/dlygUugxR3 https://t.co/YYdOY1jwBr

To keep our customers and staff safe during the pandemic, only medical face masks or unvalved respirators will be accepted on board of airBaltic flights.
👉 Read more about the health and safety measures throughout your trip with us: https://t.co/2XRERWiQRA https://t.co/1QOu6ACE8E
Without naming any city or country, which is your favourite travel destination of all time? 🤔👇

We are excited to announce a new codeshare agreement between @ITAAirways and airBaltic! Our customers will benefit from convenient access to various destinations in Italy, while ITA Airways passengers can now purchase tickets to Riga: https://t.co/pqxJrLXhEq https://t.co/IWuA0HzKNB

data.text: airBaltic has concluded a partnership agreement with Latvian Olympic Committee and will provide support to Latvian athletes travelling to and from international events. In honor of the partnership, airBaltic has adjusted the livery of the YL-CSL aircraft: https://t.co/OdchbU7HpN https://t.co/nLLJzeyHxm

Ar lepnumu paziņojam sadarbību ar @Olimpiade_lv, lai sniegtu atbalstu Latvijas sportistiem, dodoties pārstāvēt mūsu valsts vārdu pasaulē. Par godu sadarbībai, turpmāk YL-CSL karoga motīva lidmašīnu rotās vārds “Latvija” un komitejas logo: https://t.co/RPfM7N8E9v https://t.co/OtThCWNUMi

Another week has passed, Friday is here and so is #airBalticQuiz! 
Have you ever thought why are the cabin lights dimmed during take-offs/landings at night? 💡

During November 2021, airBaltic has carried 157 200 passengers – 265% more than during the same period last year. In November 2021, we performed 2 740 flights: https://t.co/zmwe6rVsLJ https://t.co/rjilOGKesm

Experience behind the scenes and making of airBaltic annual calendar with us!💚 Through the pages of our 2022 calendar, we tell a story of women in different roles in aviation and our commitment to sustainable flying.
✈️airBaltic calendars are available on https://t.co/MKXY9cOOv6 https://t.co/6oDy4SQY8e

Our festive flight deals are here! ☃️ If you need a last-minute present, look no further as tickets to all destinations for very low prices are now available: https://t.co/6chLl7PKER
Book 💻 07.12.2021 - 13.12.2021
Travel ✈️ 20.12.2021 - 31.03.2022 https://t.co/qh6w0pKc1V

We're very proud of our ten airBaltic Pilot Academy students who have become graduates, receiving commercial pilot licenses upon completion of the full-time airline transport pilot program. Congratulations on new beginnings and a career take-off! ✈️ https://t.co/TyIqmNiw64

data.text:
We thank all our passengers for their patience and understanding during the extra snowy weather last week 💚 We're happy to be back on track, so let's start a new week with a warm hello from our pilots!
📸 https://t.co/aNpiX9Bryv https://t.co/n4RVwnqbcq

urls.title: Šodien ielido un izlido - Jaunākā lidojumu informācija
urls.description: Vienalga vai Jūs lido pats, vai arī plāno sagaidīt kādu personu lidostā, šeit atradīsi jaunāko informāciju par airBaltic lidojumiem, lai efektīvāk varētu saplānot savu laiku.

data.text: Dārgie pasažieri, šogad ziema iestājusies pamatīgi – novērojama īpaši stipra snigšana. Pateicamies par jūsu pacietību un uzticību, kamēr mēs parūpējamies, lai droši nogādātu jūs plānotajā galamērķī. Aktuālā lidojumu informācija šeit: https://t.co/JT7bE2BAk9 https://t.co/w9EyF0VMrZ

urls.title: Flight status | Live flight information | airBaltic
urls.description: Whether you are flying, or need to pick up a loved one or colleague at the airport, you can find the latest scheduled times in order to plan your day most efficiently!

data.text: Dear passengers, winter has come in full swing and we are experiencing some serious snow in Riga. Thank you for your patience and trust as we are doing our utmost to carry you home safely. Find the latest flight information here: https://t.co/lOjysLs6NP https://t.co/4I4A5WfonD

urls.title: Flight status | Live flight information | airBaltic
urls.description: Whether you are flying, or need to pick up a loved one or colleague at the airport, you can find the latest scheduled times in order to plan your day most efficiently!

data.text: Due to ongoing weather conditions and airport capacity restrictions, schedule disruptions are expected at Riga airport for airBaltic flights today. Follow the link for your flight status: https://t.co/4OhJpoGbeC https://t.co/FVWKWOdZ9s

urls.title: Šodien ielido un izlido - Jaunākā lidojumu informācija
urls.description: Vienalga vai Jūs lido pats, vai arī plāno sagaidīt kādu personu lidostā, šeit atradīsi jaunāko informāciju par airBaltic lidojumiem, lai efektīvāk varētu saplānot savu laiku.

data.text: Informējam, ka slikto laikapstākļu un lidostas kapacitātes ierobežojumu dēļ airBaltic lidojumu grafikā uz/no Rīgas lidostas šodien ir iespējamas izmaiņas. Lūdzam sekot līdzi informācijai par lidojumiem šeit: https://t.co/YkMzCDobpU https://t.co/0wGc1zr1Cn

Šobrīd tālruņu līnijas var būt noslogotas un pateicamies Jums par pacietību. Ietekmētie pasažieri var doties uz viesnīcu. Viesnīcas izmaksas tiks kompensētas un jaunas biļetes nosūtītas cik vien drīz iespējams.

Laika apstākļu dēļ Rīgas lidostā ir atcelti airBaltic lidojumi līdz 4. decembra plkst. 6 rītā. Reisu BT791 uz Dubaiju plāno veikt ar kavēšanos. Lūdzam sazināties ar zvanu centru pa tālruni +371 6700 6006, ja nepieciešama palīdzība. https://t.co/Y3kU0PRJ7A

We are aware our lines may be busy and thank for your patience. Affected passengers may also proceed to hotel if not arranged with such already, costs will be reimbursed and new tickets sent by us as soon as possible.

Due to weather conditions and runway closure at Riga airport all our flights to/from Riga till 6AM on December 4 are cancelled. Flight BT791 to Dubai will be delayed. Please contact our call center +371 6700 6006 for assistance if you have been affected. https://t.co/y0TZVVmZsF
airBaltic on flight BT102: https://t.co/mm2Mj8RuTX
airBaltic par lidojumu BT102: https://t.co/E2spciimGJ

data.text: airBaltic calendar of 2022 is here!💚This year’s calendar puts our pilots, technicians, cabin crew and company managers in the spotlight representing women in aviation and serving as an inspiration to join the industry. Get yours here: https://t.co/nsHmrRbk1Q https://t.co/L93cZyfILz

December is here and so is the latest Baltic Outlook - available on board of our flights! In this issue fall in love with the city of Amsterdam, a destination that embodies beauty and art. 🎨
Discover this and other exciting stories on board and online: https://t.co/0HxWNrwlCE https://t.co/jidgHnOZRH

data.text: #DidYouKnow that FDM (Flight Data Monitoring) system on @Airbus A220 records few hundred parameters of aircraft during the flight (such as control surface positions, engine parameters, as well others) and every flight can be re-played using special software afterwards? https://t.co/miduilp1la
Catching snowflakes ❄️ and flights ✈️ https://t.co/LiH5OtWKPy

We are glad to announce that as of late November 2021, we have taken over passenger handling and flight coordinator duties at @Riga_Airport with our own staff. Read more: https://t.co/Tz4ktnjuAh https://t.co/zX7TsyUrMZ

data.text: airBaltic's new #NFT collection is live! 🔔 Edition 7 NFTs are showcasing Jelgava #cryptoart and have been issued on the @opensea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether. A total of 10 new unique collectibles can be purchased now: https://t.co/vZ5kSxl2g7 https://t.co/GX0spfFvDk

Thank you for participating! Majority said we have 17 codeshare partners, but do we? 🤔
airBaltic currently has 24 codeshare partners which offer our passengers a broader route network and better connectivity! 😏 Be sure to check all the possibilities on our website!

Got a connecting flight via @Riga_Airport? ✈️ Then enjoy effortless transfers, exciting destinations and experience the charm of Riga Old Town in just 20 minutes to turn your transfer into a mini adventure! https://t.co/cSxuJmtKCQ

Happy #airBalticQuiz day! We shared some exciting news - codeshare agreement between Emirates and airBaltic has been signed! 🥳 This partneship opens up new horizonts for our passengers! 
Do you know how many codeshare partners airBaltic currently has? ✈️

data.text: It has been a true honour to represent @Airbus A220-300 aircraft and share the airBaltic experience in one of the leading aviation industry events in the world – @DubaiAirshow. Watch our recap video and witness the show together with us! https://t.co/zTOyiVWuPI

Thank you for participating! We have a lot of detail oriented followers! The aircraft that had the best time being showcased at the Dubai airshow was indeed our YL-ABF! ✈️ Here’s to many more adventures! 💚
Drop your best window seat pics ⛅ We'll go first. https://t.co/sVSMFhKqPG

#airBalticQuiz tiime! We’ve been keeping busy (and proud) participating in #DAS 🇦🇪
Our newest addition to the family has traveled far and wide to be showcased in Dubai. Have you noticed which of our #A220 is in the air show? ✈️ 
Pssst, it’s our 32nd aircraft if that helps 👀
